Made by <a href="https://github.com/HashRei">@HashRei</a>

# Getting Started

## Description

Subgraph that returns the holders of Bored Ape Yacht Club NFTs üêí


## Requirements

- [git](https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2/Getting-Started-Installing-Git)
  - You'll know you did it right if you can run `git --version` and you see a response like `git version x.x.x`
- [Nodejs & npm](https://nodejs.org/en/)
  - You'll know you've installed nodejs right if you can run:
    - `node --version` And get an ouput like: `vx.x.x`
  - You'll know you've installed npx right if you can run:
    - `npm --version` And get an ouput like: `x.x.x`
- [Yarn](https://classic.yarnpkg.com/lang/en/docs/install/) instead of `npm`
  - You'll know you've installed yarn right if you can run:
    - `yarn --version` And get an output like: `x.x.x`
    - You might need to install it with npm
 - [The Graph](https://thegraph.com/hosted-service/)
    - Sign in with your GitHub account


### Build with...
  ![GraphQl](https://img.shields.io/badge/GraphQl-E10098?style=for-the-badge&logo=graphql&logoColor=white)
  and Subgraphs

## Quickstart

1. Clone and install dependencies

```
git clone git@github.com:HashRei/bored-ape-yacht-club-top-holders-second.git
cd bored-ape-yacht-club-top-holders-second
yarn
```

2. Run

```
graph codegen
graph auth   
yarn dev
```


## Deployed version üëá
https://thegraph.com/hosted-service/subgraph/hashrei/bored-ape-yacht-club-top-holders-second
